_v.en: When the earth is rocked with a terrible quake
and man says, ‘What is the matter with her?’
On that day she will relate her chronicles
for her Lord will have inspired her.

_v.ar: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
_v.en: On that day, mankind will issue forth in various groups to be shown their deeds.

_v.ar: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
_v.en: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it,

_v.ar: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
_v.en: and whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.
